basics.headline: Stand-up Comedian & Actor
basics.name: Jerry Seinfeld
basics.summary: Renowned stand-up comedian and actor, known for observational humor and creating one of the most successful sitcoms in television history. Experienced performer with decades of live shows, writing, and television production.

organization.name: Comedy Clubs Nationwide
organization.description: Live performance venues including The Improv, The Comedy Cellar, and national theaters.

employments.summary: Performed live observational comedy in clubs, theaters, and arenas across the United States and internationally.
highlights: Performed on late-night shows including The Tonight Show and Late Night with David Letterman
Built a reputation as a leading observational comic of his generation

references.name: George Shapiro
references.testimonial: Jerry’s comedic voice defined an era of observational humor and resonated with millions worldwide.

employments.summary: Co-created and starred in the sitcom 'Seinfeld,' widely considered one of the most successful and influential shows in television history.
highlights: Starred as a fictionalized version of himself for nine seasons
Show won multiple Emmy and Golden Globe awards
Redefined the sitcom format with its 'show about nothing' approach

organization.name: Queens College, City University of New York

courses.name: Theater Arts
courses.summary: Training in stagecraft, acting, and performance techniques.

courses.name: Mass Communication
courses.summary: Studied media, broadcasting, and public presentation.

courses.name: Creative Writing
courses.summary: Focused on narrative and comedic writing.

initiatives.summary: Created a web series showcasing conversations with comedians while driving and sharing coffee.

organization.name: Sony Pictures Television
organization.description: Television and digital media production studio.

highlights: Featured over 80 prominent comedians and actors
Innovative digital-first format attracted millions of viewers
initiatives.name: Comedians in Cars Getting Coffee

issuer.name: Mark Twain Prize for American Humor
issuer.description: Award presented by the Kennedy Center.

certificates.name: Mark Twain Prize
certificates.summary: Honored for lifetime achievement in comedy.

publications.name: Seinlanguage
publications.summary: A bestselling book compiling Jerry’s observational humor and comedic insights.

interests.name: Classic Cars
interests.summary: Collector and enthusiast of vintage cars.
